title: Identify Denial Trends
description: A revenue cycle manager needs to run a report to identify the top reasons for claim denials over the last quarter.

tasks.description: Open the reporting module in the billing system.
Run a 'Denial Analysis' report for the previous quarter, grouped by denial reason code.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a report summarizing all denials.

tasks.description: Analyze the report and identify that the top denial reason is 'Duplicate Claim', indicating a potential system issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager successfully uses data to identify a root cause for denials that needs to be investigated.
